title: Describe a typical family gathering. What do you usually do together?

korean: 이번 달에 부모님 댁에 다녀왔어, 한 달 만이더라고.
엄마가 미리 연락해서 좋아하는 음식 뭐 먹고 싶냐고 물어보셨어.
나는 엄마 손맛이 그리워서 된장찌개랑 불고기 만들어 달라고 했어.
집에 도착하니까 벌써 음식 냄새가 나는 거 있지, 배고파졌어.
엄마는 내가 살 빠졌다고 하시고, 아빠는 운동 열심히 하냐고 물어보셨어.
식탁에 앉으니까 반찬이 정말 푸짐하게 차려져 있었어.
엄마 요리는 항상 맛있는데, 집밥이 이렇게 그리웠나 싶더라.
밥 먹으면서 요즘 어떻게 지내는지, 회사 일은 괜찮은지 물어보셨어.
부모님이랑 얘기하다 보니 어느새 시간이 훌쩍 지나갔어.
식사 후에 같이 TV 보면서 과일도 먹고 편하게 있었어.
집에 가려고 일어서니까 엄마가 반찬 싸주시겠다고 하시더라고.
짐이 무거웠지만 뿌듯한 마음으로 집에 돌아왔어, 다음 주말에 또 와야지.
english: I visited my parents' place this, like, month, it had been a month.
Mom called ahead and asked, I mean, what food I wanted to eat.
I missed mom's cooking, so I, like, asked for doenjang jjigae and bulgogi.
When I arrived home, I could already, I mean, smell the food, and I got hungry.
So mom said I lost weight, and dad asked if I was exercising regularly.
When I sat at the table, there, like, were so many side dishes laid out.
Mom's cooking is always delicious, I realized how much I missed home-cooked meals.
So while eating, they asked how I've been doing and if work was okay.
Talking with my parents, time, I mean, flew by before I knew it.
After the meal, we watched TV, well, together, ate some fruit, and relaxed.
When I got up to go home, mom, like, said she'd pack some side dishes for me.
The bag was heavy, but I came home with, you know, a full heart, I should visit again next weekend.
